definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: hook, pin or peg (etym. unknown)—pl. abs. [[וׇוִים]] Ex 38:28; cstr. [[וׇוֵי]] Ex 27:10 + 5 t.; [[וׇיֵיהֶם]] Ex 26:32 + 5 t.;—only P, in description of tabernacle Ex 26:32, Ex 26:37, Ex 27:10, Ex 27:11, Ex 27:17, Ex 36:36, Ex 36:38, Ex 38:10, Ex 38:11, Ex 38:12, Ex 38:17, Ex 38:19, Ex 38:28, the hooks or pegs of gold and silver, fastened on, or in, the posts of the tabernacle, to support the various hangings (curtains, screens, etc.)
